name: yzy-app
description: react19/next15 web app for yzy brand with multimodal embeddings fueling a subtly innovative digital experience. minimalist and utilitarian ui/ux/ix/design language; monospace type, reminsicent of older computer systems; energy from first principles; neutral/off-white tones, professional yet slightly unpolished, deliberate focus on less-is-moreism, direct and practical with intention...

reasons: Emphasizes novel solutions and cutting-edge technology (react19/next15, multimodal embeddings).
Focuses on a unique digital experience through a minimalist and innovative design language.
Aims to push boundaries with a focus on 'less-is-moreism'.
Prioritizes a direct and practical approach with intention, suggesting a novel solution.
secondaryTypes: Further explore the specifics of the multimodal embeddings and their role in the project.
Investigate the use cases and target audience for the yzy brand web app.
Consider conducting user research to validate the design language and user experience.
